subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: New Orleans won the No. 1 pick in the draft lottery, and because the Nets missed out on a top-three pick, they will send their first-round selection to Portland.
snippet: New Orleans won the No. 1 pick in the draft lottery, and because the Nets missed out on a top-three pick, they will send their first-round selection to Portland.
